Package io.wcm.handler.link.type.helpers

@Version("1.0.1") package io.wcm.handler.link.type.helpers
Convenience classes for implementing link types.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.wcm.handler.link.type
    Default link type implementations.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    InternalLinkResolver
    Implements resolving an internal link for link types.
    InternalLinkResolverOptions
    Options to influence the link resolving process from InternalLinkResolver.
    LinkResolveCounter
    Counts number of recursive link resolve requests to detect endless loops.
